title: Absolving Renekton?
body: Out of curiosity, what do you guys think will happen between Nasus and Renekton. After reading Bloodlines and hearing the SoundCloud stream, I find it heavily implied that the conflict between the two brothers will be resolved before Azir and Xerath face off. What could happen? I hopefully believe that Nasus manages to shake off Renekton's madness after a long fight (no casualties, thank you).

replies.body:
I doubt Shurima lore will keep to continue. Seems like it finished and a lot thing left behind.

We're probably going for next place. Like may be Void, highly Piltover - Zaun.
They team up and fight Dynamitron, Lord of 4 Man Queues. They aren't able to defeat him in Season 7 and the game dies.
